name: claude-for-frappe
description: AI-powered bridge connecting Claude Desktop to Frappe ERP via Frappe Assistant Core
long_description: This extension creates an intelligent bridge between Claude Desktop and your Frappe ERP system through the Frappe Assistant Core app. Enable AI-powered data analysis, automated report generation, and natural language interactions with your business data.

server_url.title: Frappe Server URL
server_url.description: URL of your Frappe instance (e.g., https://your-domain.com)

api_key.title: Frappe API Key
api_key.description: Your Frappe API key for authentication

api_secret.title: Frappe API Secret
api_secret.description: Your Frappe API secret for authentication

debug_mode.title: Enable Debug Mode
debug_mode.description: Set to '1' to enable detailed logging for troubleshooting

tools.name: run_python_code
tools.description: Execute custom Python code for advanced data analysis, calculations, and business logic with full access to Frappe framework

tools.name: analyze_business_data
tools.description: Perform comprehensive statistical analysis on Frappe business data. Calculate averages, trends, correlations, and business insights from any DocType

tools.name: run_database_query
tools.description: Execute custom SQL queries on Frappe database and perform advanced data analysis. Perfect for complex business intelligence and custom reporting

tools.name: create_visualization
tools.description: Create interactive charts and visualizations from Frappe business data. Charts are displayed inline and saved as files

tools.name: generate_report
tools.description: Execute a Frappe report to get business data and analytics. Use this for financial reports, sales analysis, inventory reports, etc.

tools.name: get_report_data
tools.description: Get detailed report data and structure for a specific report. Understand what data fields are available before executing

tools.name: search_documents
tools.description: Global search across all accessible documents

tools.name: search_doctype
tools.description: Search within a specific DocType

tools.name: search_link
tools.description: Search for link field options

tools.name: get_doctype_info
tools.description: Get DocType metadata and field information

tools.name: list_documents
tools.description: Search and list Frappe documents with optional filtering. Primary tool for data exploration and discovery

tools.name: create_document
tools.description: Create a new Frappe document (e.g., Customer, Sales Invoice, Item, etc.). Add new records to the system

tools.name: get_document
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Frappe document

tools.name: update_document
tools.description: Update/modify an existing Frappe document. Change field values in existing records

tools.name: delete_document
tools.description: Delete an existing Frappe document. Remove records from the system

tools.name: submit_document
tools.description: Submit a Frappe document to change its status from draft to submitted

tools.name: run_workflow
tools.description: Execute workflow actions on documents (start, approve, reject, etc.)

tools.name: create_dashboard
tools.description: Create custom dashboards for business intelligence and data visualization

tools.name: create_dashboard_chart
tools.description: Create dashboard charts for data visualization and business insights

tools.name: list_user_dashboards
tools.description: List all dashboards accessible to the current user
